mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ci_reserv (user_id, movie_id, seat) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{movie.id}, #{seat})
mapper.sql: SELECT re.id "re_id", re.seat "re_seat", re.regdate "re_regdate", u.id "u_id", u.username "u_username", u.name "u_name", u.authorities "u_authorities", u.regdate "u_regdate", m.id "m_id", m.title "m_title", m.genre "m_genre", m.runtime "m_runtime", m.director "m_director", m.actor "m_actor", m.synopsis "m_synopsis", m.regdate "m_regdate" FROM ci_reserv re, ci_user u, ci_movies m WHERE re.user_id = u.id
mapper.select: SELECT re.id "re_id", re.seat "re_seat", re.regdate "re_regdate", u.id "u_id", u.username "u_username", u.password "u_password", u.name "u_name", u.authorities "u_authorities", u.regdate "u_regdate", m.id "m_id", m.title "m_title", m.genre "m_genre", m.runtime "m_runtime", m.director "m_director", m.synopsis "m_synopsis", m.regdate "m_regdate" FROM ci_reserv re, ci_user u, ci_movies m WHERE re.user_id = u.id AND re.movie_id = m.id AND re.user_id = #{param1} ORDER BY re.id DESC LIMIT #{param2}, 5
SELECT id, seat FROM ci_reserv WHERE id = #{param1}

SELECT re.id "re_id", re.seat "re_seat", re.regdate "re_regdate", u.id "u_id", u.username "u_username", u.password "u_password", u.name "u_name", u.authorities "u_authorities", u.regdate "u_regdate", m.id "m_id", m.title "m_title", m.genre "m_genre", m.runtime "m_runtime", m.director "m_director", m.synopsis "m_synopsis", m.regdate "m_regdate" FROM ci_reserv re, ci_user u, ci_movies m WHERE re.user_id = u.id AND re.movie_id = m.id AND re.user_id = #{param1} and m.id = #{param2} ORDER BY re.id DESC LIMIT #{param3}, 5

select u.id "u_id", u.username "u_username", u.password "u_password", u.name "u_name", u.authorities "u_authorities", u.regdate "u_regdate", m.id "m_id", m.title "m_title", m.genre "m_genre", m.runtime "m_runtime", m.director "m_director", m.synopsis "m_synopsis", m.regdate "m_regdate", group_concat(re.seat) as totalSeat from ci_reserv re, ci_user u, ci_movies m WHERE re.user_id = u.id AND re.movie_id = m.id AND re.user_id = #{param1} group by movie_id

SELECT re.id "re_id", re.seat "re_seat", re.regdate "re_regdate", u.id "u_id", u.username "u_username", u.password "u_password", u.name "u_name", u.authorities "u_authorities", u.regdate "u_regdate", m.id "m_id", m.title "m_title", m.genre "m_genre", m.runtime "m_runtime", m.director "m_director", m.synopsis "m_synopsis", m.regdate "m_regdate" FROM ci_reserv re, ci_user u, ci_movies m WHERE re.user_id = u.id AND re.movie_id = m.id AND re.user_id = #{param1} ORDER BY re.id DESC LIMIT #{param2}, #{param3}
